utilMDE
Class TaskManager

java.lang.Object
  utilMDE.TaskManager

public class TaskManager
extends java.lang.Object

TaskManager extracts information about tasks from text files and provides structured output. For example, it can extract all of the tasks associated with a specific milestone or person and total the amount of work required.
